an2.32:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha. bhasissami”ti.
an2.32:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an2.32:2.3: Asabbhi hetam, bhikkhave, upannatam yadidam akatannuta akatavedita.
an2.32:2.4: Kevala esa, bhikkhave, asappurisabhumi yadidam akatannuta akatavedita. (…)
an2.32:2.5: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, katannu hoti katavedi.
an2.32:2.6: Sabbhi hetam, bhikkhave, upannatam yadidam katannuta katavedita.
an2.32:2.7: Kevala esa, bhikkhave, sappurisabhumi yadidam katannuta katavedita”ti.
an2.33:1.4: Ekena, bhikkhave, amsena mataram parihareyya, ekena amsena pitaram parihareyya vassasatayuko vassasatajivi so ca nesam ucchadanaparimaddananhapanasambahanena.
an2.33:1.5: Te ca tattheva muttakarisam cajeyyum, na tveva, bhikkhave, matapitunam katam va hoti patikatam va.
an2.33:1.6: Imissa ca, bhikkhave, mahapathaviya pahutarattaratanaya matapitaro issaradhipacce rajje patitthapeyya, na tveva, bhikkhave, matapitunam katam va hoti patikatam va.
an2.33:1.8: Bahukara, bhikkhave, matapitaro puttanam apadaka posaka imassa lokassa dassetaro.
an2.33:1.9: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, matapitaro assaddhe saddhasampadaya samadapeti niveseti patitthapeti, dussile silasampadaya samadapeti niveseti patitthapeti, macchari cagasampadaya samadapeti niveseti patitthapeti, duppanne pannasampadaya samadapeti niveseti patitthapeti, ettavata kho, bhikkhave, matapitunam katanca hoti patikatanca”ti.
an2.34:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi. Sammodaniyam katham …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an2.34:1.4: “Yathakatham pana bhavam gotamo kiriyavadi ca akiriyavadi ca”ti?
an2.34:2.1: “Akiriyam kho aham, brahmana, vadami kayaduccaritassa vaciduccaritassa manoduccaritassa, anekavihitanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam akiriyam vadami.
an2.34:2.2: Kiriyanca kho aham, brahmana, vadami kayasucaritassa vacisucaritassa manosucaritassa, anekavihitanam kusalanam dhammanam kiriyam vadami.
an2.34:2.3: Evam kho aham, brahmana, kiriyavadi ca akiriyavadi ca”ti.
an2.34:3.1: “Abhikkantam, bho gotama …pe… upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
an2.35:1.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho anathapindiko gahapati bhagavantam etadavoca:
an2.35:1.2: “kati nu kho, bhante, loke dakkhineyya, kattha ca danam databban”ti?
an2.35:1.5: Ime kho, gahapati, dve loke dakkhineyya, ettha ca danam databban”ti.
an2.35:2.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
an2.36:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an2.36:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
an2.36:1.4: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an2.36:1.6: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an2.36:1.9: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an2.36:1.10: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an2.36:2.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an2.36:2.3: So kayassa bheda param marana annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an2.36:2.4: So tato cuto agami hoti, aganta itthattam.
an2.36:2.5: Ayam vuccati, avuso, ajjhattasamyojano puggalo agami hoti, aganta itthattam.
an2.36:3.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an2.36:3.3: So annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an2.36:3.4: So kayassa bheda param marana annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an2.36:3.5: So tato cuto anagami hoti, anaganta itthattam.
an2.36:3.6: Ayam vuccatavuso, bahiddhasamyojano puggalo anagami hoti, anaganta itthattam.
an2.36:4.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an2.36:4.2: So kamanamyeva nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
an2.36:4.3: So bhavanamyeva nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
an2.36:4.6: So kayassa bheda param marana annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an2.36:4.7: So tato cuto anagami hoti, anaganta itthattam.
an2.36:4.8: Ayam vuccatavuso, bahiddhasamyojano puggalo anagami hoti, anaganta itthattan”ti.
an2.36:5.1: Atha kho sambahula samacitta devata yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho ta devata bhagavantam etadavocum:
an2.36:5.2: “eso, bhante, ayasma sariputto pubbarame migaramatupasade bhikkhunam ajjhattasamyojananca puggalam deseti bahiddhasamyojananca.
an2.36:5.4: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yenayasma sariputto tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an2.36:5.6: Atha kho bhagava—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—jetavane antarahito pubbarame migaramatupasade ayasmato sariputtassa sammukhe paturahosi.
an2.36:5.8: Ayasmapi kho sariputto bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an2.36:5.9: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam bhagava etadavoca:
an2.36:6.1: “Idha, sariputta, sambahula samacitta devata yenaham tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho, sariputta, ta devata mam etadavocum:
an2.36:6.2: ‘eso, bhante, ayasma sariputto pubbarame migaramatupasade bhikkhunam ajjhattasamyojananca puggalam deseti bahiddhasamyojananca.
an2.36:6.4: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yena ayasma sariputto tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’ti.
an2.36:6.5: Ta kho pana, sariputta, devata dasapi hutva visampi hutva timsampi hutva cattalisampi hutva pannasampi hutva satthipi hutva araggakotinitudanamattepi titthanti, na ca annamannam byabadhenti.
an2.36:6.7: ‘tattha nuna tasam devatanam tatha cittam bhavitam yena ta devata dasapi hutva visampi hutva timsampi hutva cattalisampi hutva pannasampi hutva satthipi hutva araggakotinitudanamattepi titthanti na ca annamannam byabadhenti’ti.
an2.36:6.8: Na kho panetam, sariputta, evam datthabbam.
an2.36:6.9: Idheva kho, sariputta, tasam devatanam tatha cittam bhavitam, yena ta devata dasapi hutva …pe… na ca annamannam byabadhenti.
an2.36:6.13: ‘Santindriyananhi vo, sariputta, santamanasanam santamyeva kayakammam bhavissati santam vacikammam santam manokammam.
an2.36:6.16: Anassum kho, sariputta, annatitthiya paribbajaka ye imam dhammapariyayam nassosun’”ti.
an2.37:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma mahakaccano varanayam viharati bhaddasaritire.
an2.37:1.3: Atha kho aramadando brahmano yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakaccanena saddhim sammodi.
an2.37:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho aramadando brahmano ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
an2.37:1.5: “ko nu kho, bho kaccana, hetu ko paccayo yena khattiyapi khattiyehi vivadanti, brahmanapi brahmanehi vivadanti, gahapatikapi gahapatikehi vivadanti”ti?
an2.37:1.6: “Kamaragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanahetu kho, brahmana, khattiyapi khattiyehi vivadanti, brahmanapi brahmanehi vivadanti, gahapatikapi gahapatikehi vivadanti”ti.
an2.37:2.1: “Ko pana, bho kaccana, hetu ko paccayo yena samanapi samanehi vivadanti”ti?
an2.37:3.1: “Atthi pana, bho kaccana, koci lokasmim yo imanceva kamaragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto, imanca ditthiragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto”ti?
an2.37:3.2: “Atthi, brahmana, lokasmim yo imanceva kamaragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto, imanca ditthiragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto”ti.
an2.37:4.1: “Ko pana so, bho kaccana, lokasmim yo imanceva kamaragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto, imanca ditthiragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto”ti?
an2.37:4.2: “Atthi, brahmana, puratthimesu janapadesu savatthi nama nagaram.
an2.37:4.3: Tattha so bhagava etarahi viharati araham sammasambuddho.
an2.37:4.4: So hi, brahmana, bhagava imanceva kamaragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto, imanca ditthiragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto”ti.
an2.37:5.1: Evam vutte, aramadando brahmano utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva dakkhinam janumandalam pathaviyam nihantva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva tikkhattum udanam udanesi:
an2.37:9.1: Yo hi so bhagava imanceva kamaragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto, imanca ditthiragabhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyutthanajjhosanam samatikkanto”ti.
an2.37:10.2: Seyyathapi, bho kaccana, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya; andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota kaccanena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
an2.37:10.3: Esaham, bho kaccana, tam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
an2.37:10.4: Upasakam mam bhavam kaccano dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
an2.38:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahakaccano madhurayam viharati gundavane.
an2.38:1.2: Atha kho kandarayano brahmano yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakaccanena saddhim …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho kandarayano brahmano ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
an2.38:1.3: “sutam metam, bho kaccana, ‘na samano kaccano brahmane jinne vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivadeti va paccuttheti va asanena va nimanteti’ti.
an2.38:1.5: Na hi bhavam kaccano brahmane jinne vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivadeti va paccuttheti va asanena va nimanteti.
an2.38:2.1: “Atthi, brahmana, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena vuddhabhumi ca akkhata daharabhumi ca.
an2.38:2.2: Vuddho cepi, brahmana, hoti asitiko va navutiko va vassasatiko va jatiya, so ca kame paribhunjati kamamajjhavasati kamaparilahena paridayhati kamavitakkehi khajjati kamapariyesanaya ussuko.
an2.38:2.3: Atha kho so balo na therotveva sankhyam gacchati.
an2.38:2.4: Daharo cepi, brahmana, hoti yuva susukalakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannagato pathamena vayasa.
an2.38:2.5: So ca na kame paribhunjati na kamamajjhavasati, na kamaparilahena paridayhati, na kamavitakkehi khajjati, na kamapariyesanaya ussuko.
an2.38:2.6: Atha kho so pandito therotveva sankhyam gacchati”ti.
an2.38:3.1: Evam vutte, kandarayano brahmano utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva daharanam satam bhikkhunam pade sirasa vandati:
an2.38:4.1: “Abhikkantam, bho kaccana …pe… upasakam mam bhavam kaccano dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
an2.39:1.1: “Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye cora balavanto honti, rajano tasmim samaye dubbala honti.
an2.39:1.2: Tasmim, bhikkhave, samaye ranno na phasu hoti atiyatum va niyyatum va paccantime va janapade anusannatum.
an2.39:1.3: Brahmanagahapatikanampi tasmim samaye na phasu hoti atiyatum va niyyatum va bahirani va kammantani pativekkhitum.
an2.39:1.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yasmim samaye papabhikkhu balavanto honti, pesala bhikkhu tasmim samaye dubbala honti.
an2.39:1.5: Tasmim, bhikkhave, samaye pesala bhikkhu tunhibhuta tunhibhutava sanghamajjhe sankasayanti paccantime va janapade acchanti.
an2.39:1.6: Tayidam, bhikkhave, hoti bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
an2.39:2.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye rajano balavanto honti, cora tasmim samaye dubbala honti.
an2.39:2.2: Tasmim, bhikkhave, samaye ranno phasu hoti atiyatum va niyyatum va paccantime va janapade anusannatum.
an2.39:2.3: Brahmanagahapatikanampi tasmim samaye phasu hoti atiyatum va niyyatum va bahirani va kammantani pativekkhitum.
an2.39:2.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yasmim samaye pesala bhikkhu balavanto honti, papabhikkhu tasmim samaye dubbala honti.
an2.39:2.5: Tasmim, bhikkhave, samaye papabhikkhu tunhibhuta tunhibhutava sanghamajjhe sankasayanti, yena va pana tena pakkamanti.
an2.39:2.6: Tayidam, bhikkhave, hoti bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
an2.40:1.1: “Dvinnaham, bhikkhave, micchapatipattim na vannemi, gihissa va pabbajitassa va.
an2.40:1.2: Gihi va, bhikkhave, pabbajito va micchapatipanno micchapatipattadhikaranahetu na aradhako hoti nayam dhammam kusalam.
an2.40:2.1: Dvinnaham, bhikkhave, sammapatipattim vannemi, gihissa va pabbajitassa va.
an2.40:2.2: Gihi va, bhikkhave, pabbajito va sammapatipanno sammapatipattadhikaranahetu aradhako hoti nayam dhammam kusalan”ti.
an2.41:1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duggahitehi suttantehi byanjanappatirupakehi atthanca dhammanca patibahanti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanahitaya patipanna bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
an2.41:1.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apunnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam antaradhapenti.
an2.41:2.1: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suggahitehi suttantehi byanjanappatirupakehi atthanca dhammanca anulomenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahujanahitaya patipanna bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an2.41:2.2: Bahunca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu punnam pasavanti, te cimam saddhammam thapenti”ti.
